emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '2 fed hvidløg' is best matched with 'hvidløg' because it is the most direct and least processed form of garlic available in the database. This aligns with the principle of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient. The other options, 'hvidløg i olie' and 'hvidløgsbaguette, frost', involve additional processing or are part of a prepared meal, making 'hvidløg' the most appropriate match for raw garlic.
The ingredient '1 spsk olivenolie' is best matched with 'olivenolie' as it is an exact match. This choice directly reflects the ingredient without unnecessary processing or broader categorization.

The ingredient '1 løg' is best matched with 'løg' because it is the most direct and least processed form of onion available in the database. This aligns with the principle of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient. The other options, 'løg, ristede' and 'løg, hakkede, dybfrost', involve additional processing, making 'løg' the most appropriate match for a raw onion.

The ingredient '1 dl grøntsagsbouillon' is best matched with 'bouillon, hønsekød, spiseklar' as it is the closest available option for a ready-to-use bouillon. While 'grøntsagsbouillon' is not directly listed, 'bouillon, hønsekød, spiseklar' represents a general, ready-to-use bouillon, which is a reasonable broader category. The other bouillon options are either meat-based and concentrated, or a 'grøntsagsbøf' which is a final meal, making 'bouillon, hønsekød, spiseklar' the most appropriate match.

The ingredient '1 dåse hakkede tomater' is best matched with 'tomat, flået, konserves' because it is the closest option for canned tomatoes. 'Hakkede tomater' implies a processed, canned form, and 'flået, konserves' (peeled, canned) is the most similar processing level available. The other options, 'soltørrede tomater' and 'tomatpure, koncentreret', represent different forms of processing, making 'tomat, flået, konserves' the most appropriate match.
The ingredient '1 spsk olivenolie' is best matched with 'olivenolie' as it is an exact match. This choice directly reflects the ingredient without unnecessary processing or broader categorization.

The other options, 'løg, ristede' and 'løg, hakkede, dybfrost', involve additional processing, making 'løg' the most appropriate match for a raw onion.

This aligns with the principle of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient. The other options, 'hvidløg i olie' and 'hvidløgsbaguette, frost', involve additional processing or are part of a prepared meal, making 'hvidløg' the most appropriate match for raw garlic.

The ingredient '1 squash' is best matched with 'squash' as it is an exact match. This choice directly reflects the ingredient without unnecessary processing or broader categorization. The other options are different vegetables or a processed product (rasp), which are not suitable matches.

The ingredient '300 g majs' is best matched with 'majs, kerner, konserves' because it is the most common form of corn used in recipes when a specific form is not mentioned, and it represents a processed form (kernels, canned) which is a reasonable assumption for 'majs' in a recipe context. While 'majs, hele kolber' is also an option, 'majs, kerner, konserves' is more likely for a general 'majs' ingredient. 'Majsmel' is a different product, and 'babymajs' is a specific type of corn. Therefore, 'majs, kerner, konserves' is the most appropriate match.

The ingredient '150 g cheddar ost' is best matched with 'parmesan ost, 32+' because both are hard cheeses with similar production processes and therefore likely to have similar CO2 emissions. While 'gedeost, ost' and 'brie, ost 45+' are also cheeses, their production methods and fat content can differ significantly from cheddar, making parmesan a more realistic comparison for CO2 emissions.
